Studio 13

Contact Us

Our Services

Design Session

Some clients don’t need a complete redesign of a room or an entire home. This option lets you tap into two decades of interior design expertise only when you need it. It’s more like a focused consultation than a full-scale design package — a chance to troubleshoot ideas, gain clarity, or validate decisions at any stage of your project or renovation.

You might simply be looking for guidance with a specific detail. I can assist with refining sample choices, suggesting trusted brands, offering lighting recommendations, reviewing architectural drawings, and much more — whatever support helps move your project forward.

2 hour block, time can be used in person, remotely or a combination of both.

In person within 10 miles or remote | £425

Color Session

If choosing colours for your home feels daunting, this service is designed to help you navigate the many possibilities with confidence. Drawing on more than 20 years of guiding clients in expressing their personality through colour, I appreciate how important the right shades and pairings are in creating a space that feels truly yours.

There are two service levels to choose from, tailored to the scope of your project and the amount of support you need.

In person within 10 miles | £375 up to 4 rooms | £650 up to 8 rooms

Remote | £250 up to 4 rooms | £450 up to 8 rooms

Redesign

This service is ideal for clients who want to transform a room with an entirely fresh style and atmosphere. You’ll receive a bespoke digital Design Pack, which can include a scaled floor-plan layout, curated lighting and furniture selections, and a finishes sample set—depending on the scope of your project. It provides a clear visual and practical roadmap for how the design will come together, giving you everything you need to brief contractors or confidently manage the implementation yourself.

From £950 per room

Renovate

A comprehensive, tailor-made interior design service for larger projects such as renovations, extensions, or major reconfigurations. The process is customised to your needs and can guide you from the earliest design concepts through technical drawings, material selection, sourcing, procurement, and final execution.

You can choose to work with my trusted network of contractors or continue with your own team. I provide regular site visits and ongoing expert support to help you feel assured and informed at every stage of the project.

Priced per project, please book an intro call for an initial conversation.
